abstract: South Sudan Pres Salva Kiir and rebel commander Riek Machar sign another cease-fire agreement, moving closer to final deal to end 15 months of violence.
lead_paragraph: President Salva Kiir of South Sudan and the rebel commander Riek Machar have signed a cease-fire agreement.

headline.main: Rebels Agree to Cease-Fire in South Sudan
headline.print_headline: Rebels Agree to Cease-Fire in South Sudan

snippet: President Salva Kiir of South Sudan and the rebel commander Riek Machar have signed a cease-fire agreement.
